hotel.describe_property: The boutique hotel ‘The Safron Hotel, Ikeja’ is conveniently located in the exclusive suburb and serene environment of GRA Ikeja. Conveniently located 8km away from the Murtala Mohammed International airport and only 3km away from Ikeja shopping mall.
proximity_to_major_attractions: City Views Our rooftop lounge on the 7th floor with a beautiful view of the Ikeja Golf Course.
Airport Proximity Conveniently located 8km away from the Murtala Mohammed International airport and only 3km away from Ikeja shopping mall.
hotel.property_policy: No use of illicit Drugs on the premises
hotel.location_building_address: Joel Ogunnaike St, Ikeja GRA, Ikeja 101233, Lagos, Nigeria

hotel.describe_property:
Welcome to Grey Residence - Your Oasis in the Heart of Wuse, Abuja!
Discover a tranquil haven nestled in the bustling business hub of Wuse at Grey Residence. Our boutique hotel offers a unique blend of comfort, sophistication, and serenity, providing a respite from the lively surroundings.
proximity_to_major_attractions: www
rrr
ewwww
hotel.property_policy:
No pets.
Check-in is 2pm
Checkout is 12pm
Breakfast starts 7am and ends 10am
Cancellation before 24 hours on arrival is free.
A room nigh charge on cancellation less than 24 hours of arrival.
No smoking in the rooms
Minimum check-in age is 18
A government issued ID card is required before check in.
hotel.location_building_address: Ozumba Mbadiwe Ave, Eti-Osa, Lagos 106104, Lagos, Nigeria

hotel.describe_property: Our spacious apartments are thoughtfully furnished with modern amenities to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay. Each unit features a cozy living area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a private balcony or patio where you can unwind and enjoy the serene surroundings.
proximity_to_major_attractions: Immigration passport office
military base
J A Eagle hospital
hotel.property_policy: more than four guest will attract extra charges, no taking of hard drugs
hotel.location_building_address: Zone 5, Plot 2029 Algiers St, near High Court, Wuse, Abuja 904101, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria

hotel.describe_property: Experience luxury and sophistication at AES Luxury Suites and Apartments. Located in the heart of the city, our exclusive accommodations offer exceptional experiences for short and long-term stays. Whether you’re traveling for business or leisure, our meticulously designed suites and apartments seamlessly blend modern elegance with personalized service. From the moment you arrive, you’ll be welcomed with a warm ambiance and an array of amenities that exceed expectations.
proximity_to_major_attractions: Jabi Lake Mall and Silverbird Galleria are a short 14 and 16 minutes drive away, respectively
The Idu Train terminal is accessible within a 16-minute drive
Nnamdi Azikwe International Airport, is 37 minutes away by car from our hotel
hotel.property_policy: No pets allowed
hotel.location_building_address: Plot 1118, Jabi Airport Road, Daki Biu District, Jabi, 900108, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria

hotel.describe_property: Qualibest Grand Hotel is a magnificent first class hotel with excellent facilities, elegant and glamour. Starting from the lobby, the hotel is tastefully furnished to provide the comfort expected from a luxury hotel, offering luxury rooms, suites, meeting facilities, fitness and wellness.We promise to consistently deliver distinctive service by constantly anticipating guests expectations, combining innovations with a highly motivated and hospitable team.  We are people with a shared commitment to consistently exceed customers’ expectations.
proximity_to_major_attractions: Magic Land Abuja is 6 km from Qualibest Grand Hotels
IBB Golf Club is 13 km from the property
Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport is 35km away from the hotel
3 km from the central business district
hotel.property_policy: No smoking in the rooms
hotel.location_building_address: 51 M.L. Wushishi St, Utako, Abuja 900108, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria

Starting from the lobby, the hotel is tastefully furnished to provide the comfort expected from a luxury hotel, offering luxury rooms, suites, meeting facilities, fitness and wellness.We promise to consistently deliver distinctive service by constantly anticipating guests expectations, combining innovations with a highly motivated and hospitable team.  We are people with a shared commitment to consistently exceed customers’ expectations.
proximity_to_major_attractions: Magic Land Abuja is 6 km from Qualibest Grand Hotels
IBB Golf Club is 13 km from the property
Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport is 35km away from the hotel
3 km from the central business district
results.location_building_address: 51 M.L. Wushishi St, Utako, Abuja 900108, Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria
